name: node-js-getting-started
description: A sample Node.js app using Express 4

scripts.test: node scripts/test-node.js && node test/helpers/newAccounts 50 npm run-script newaccount && npx mocha 'test/**/*.test.js'
scripts.test:browser: npm run-script newaccount && node scripts/test-browser.js && npx karma start --single-run --browsers ChromeHeadless
scripts.coverage: npm run-script test:browser && npm run-script test
scripts.btest: npm run build:dev && npm run test
